root.name: Federation Quest 1 - BSS Jane Seymour
root.description: For ten years the biological survey ship Jane Seymour has been floating dead in space. The federation have sent you to salvage the ship but it's not going to be an easy job. Radiation has driven the crew insane and all the biological samples on the ship have gotten loose.Reprogram robots, repair equipment, shoot monsters and get home. What could be easier?

similar_games.game: Spacewrecked: 14 Billion Light Years From Earth
